articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Congratulations to Women Football Players
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Congratulations to Women Football Players
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Saturday sent a message of congratulations to the women football players who won the title of the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asia Cup.
					 The full text of the message of congratulations reads:
						
					
					 To Our Women's Soccer Players Who Have Won the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asia Cup 
					
					 
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you, our proud and trustworthy women's soccer players, for having chalked up one victory after another and secured the first place in the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asia Cup. 
					
					 You have wonderfully lived up to the expectations of the Party, the country and the people that our women's soccer players would emerge a victor without fail.
					
					 You have played the games by giving play to your indomitable spiritual strength and employing the attacking tactics advanced by our Party and thus written an amazing sports story.
					
					 By causing the blue and red flag of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to be hoisted at the tournament, you have demonstrated to the whole world the prestige and mettle of the powerful Juche country shining together with the names of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and prepared a proud gift dedicated to the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of the country and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 On behalf of our Party, the Government of the DPRK and all the service personnel and people, I once again offer warm congratulations and militant greetings to you, the laudable daughters of the country and the people. 
					
					 The whole country is waiting for you.
					
					 Return home quickly in good health.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Greets Women East Asian Cup Winners at Airport
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Greets Women East Asian Cup Winners at Airport
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK women footballers arrived at the Pyongyang International Airport on Monday after winning the 2015 EAFF East Asian Cup.
					 During the games held in Wuhan, China they trounced the Japanese, Chinese and south Korean rivals, scoring 9 goals by applying guerilla-style offensive tactics and thus created the myth of winning every match. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju greeted them at the airport.
					
					Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and Kim Jong Man, chairman of the Football Federation of the DPRK.
					
					 At 4:00 p.m. the plane entered the area before the terminal.
					
					 Amid the playing of a welcome music, Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju came out to it.
					
					 He shook the hand of each footballer and warmly congratulated them on bringing gold medals to the country. He had a photo taken with them.
					
					 Warmly congratulating them, proud daughters of the country and its people, once again in the names of the WPK, the government of the DPRK and all service personnel and people for demonstrating the dignity and might of the power of Juche in the games by displaying indefatigable mental power and by applying the guerilla-style offensive tactics set forth by the Party, and preparing a precious gift dedicated to the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of the country and the founding of the WPK, he gave warm thanks to them.
					
					 Greatly excited and touched to have the honor of being greeted by him upon their return home, the women footballers rushed to his arms with tears welling up in their eyes.
					
					 Huge crowds at the airport enthusiastically welcomed the footballers who came back in triumph after adding glory to the country with indomitable spirit, grit and high technique.
					
					 Pyongyang City was wrapped in a festive atmosphere as more than 200,000 citizens enthusiastically welcomed them along the long route from the airport to the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Welcome Women Footballers
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Welcome Women Footballers
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Women footballers returned home after winning the title of the 2015 EAFF Women's East Asian Cup. 
					 They lived up to the expectations of the party, the country and its people by proving successful at the 2015 EAFF East Asian Cup in the wake of the 2013 East Asia Cup and the 17th Asian Games.
					
					 Pyongyang was clad in festive mood on Monday as it will greet proud daughters of the DPRK.
					
					 The route from the airport to Ryonmot-dong, Ryonghung crossroad, Kaesonmun Street and Changjon Street was crowded with more than 200,000 Pyongyangites with DPRK flags, bouquets and balloons in their hands.
					
					 A bus carrying footballers headed for the city amid welcome of people in Sunan District.
					
					 When the bus reached the entrance to Ryonmot-dong, a large platform truck waited for them.
					
					 When the truck started, the crowd again broke into rousing cheers.
					
					 They visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to lay a floral basket and bunches of flowers and paid tribute to them.
					
					 There was a press conference with players and coaches at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on the same day.
					
					 Present there were media persons in Pyongyang.
					
					 Chief coach Kim Kwang Min referred to the scope of the event and the successes made by women footballers.
					
					 Captain of the team Ra Un Sim said: We could win victory as we displayed extraordinary mental power to make a report of victory to Marshal Kim Jong Un who repeatedly showed love and repose trust in us.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Myanmar President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Myanmar President
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Aug. 10 sent a message of sympathy to Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, in connection with the fact that the recent flooding caused by torrential rains in Myanmar claimed big casualties and huge material losses.
					 The message expressed belief that the president and government of Myanmar would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster and bring the living of the people in the afflicted area to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Aug. 9.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am pleased to send sincere congratulations to Your Excellency on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule by the armed struggle organized and led by HE President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 I wish Your Excellency good health and happiness and your friendly people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 I, availing myself of this good opportunity, reiterate our will to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between our two countries in conformity with the common interests of the two friendly peoples. 
					
					 Please accept my highest regards to Your Excellency Marshal.

articles.title: Syrian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Syrian Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Syrian Arab-Korea Friendship Association headed by Chairman Fairouz Al-Mousa, member of the Regional Leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party and director of the Higher Education Department of the party, arrived here on Monday to participate in the international solidarity event for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Arriving on the same day was a delegation of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK led by Vitali Revedev.

articles.title: Officials, Members of UAWK Start Study Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Officials, Members of UAWK Start Study Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
 Hyesan, August 10 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) started a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 A kick-off meeting took place before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province on Aug. 10.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the monument and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 Han Kyong Song, vice-chairperson of the Central Committee of the union, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the study tour will mark an important occasion in hardening the firm faith of officials and members of the union to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in Mt. Paektu by raising a strong wind of education in the revolutionary traditions at all its organizations. 
					
					 They called upon all participants of the study tour to further cherish the greatness and immortal revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and deeply grasp the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader and indomitable fighting spirit displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 They called for learning from the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and hard fortitude displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters and thus stepping up a socialist emulation for increased production and discharging the duty as the patriotic farmers in the era of Songun remaining true with rice to the party's plan for building a thriving nation.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants in the study tour left for Pochonbo.

articles.title: Anniversary of Xiaohaerbaling Meeting Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Xiaohaerbaling Meeting Marked
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- It is 75 years since the Xiaohaerbaling Meeting was convened by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 The meeting was of weighty significance in bringing earlier the day of Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 At that time, the aggressors of Japan worked hard to ensure "security of rear" as part of the efforts to realize its ambition for the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 Basing himself on the scientific analysis of the situation, Kim Il Sung convened a meeting at Xiaohaerbaling with attendance of military and political cadres of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army.
					
					 In the meeting, he set forth strategic lines and policies for positively bringing about the country's liberation.
					
					 The lines and policies called for carrying on small-unit guerilla activities in order to maintain the KPRA units, the hardcore forces of the Korean revolution, training the KPRA members to be able political and military cadres and preparing the Korean people politically and ideologically.
					
					 With the meeting as an occasion, the anti-Japanese armed struggle developed into a new stage for its final victory and, consequently, Korea was liberated at last on August 15, 1945.

articles.title: Steps to Supply Drinking Water on Normal Basis
articles.content:
Steps to Supply Drinking Water on Normal Basis
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Full measures have been taken in all parts of the DPRK to supply drinking water on a normal basis in rainy season.
					 Provinces, cities and counties made big efforts to secure enough water disinfectant while a repair work was conducted to put filtering facilities on a normal operation at all reservoirs in the country.
					
					 Anti-epidemic centers ensure regular analysis of underground water and various steps were taken to prevent rainwater pump stations from being flooded.

articles.title: Majon Resort Crowded with Visitors
articles.content:
Majon Resort Crowded with Visitors
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Majon Resort on the east coast of the DPRK is now crowded with visitors.
					 According to Ju Kyong Hwa, head of the resort management office, the resort is visited by people from different parts of the country, including Pyongyang City.
					
					 The number of visitors to the resort with 6-kilometer-long beach amounts to tens of thousands a day and more than 100,000 in a red-letter day.
					
					 The recently renovated resort has various buildings and service facilities.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' "Unification of Social Systems" Is Wild Dream: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' "Unification of Social Systems" Is Wild Dream: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces' wild moves for "unification of social systems" is a treacherous act of going against the desire and wishes of all the countrymen for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, and a hideous sycophantic and traitorous act aimed to do harm to the nation with the backing of foreign forces, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The issue of reunification of Korea never allows interference by outsiders in the light of its historical background and nature, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 However, the puppet forces are making desperate efforts to leave the issue of the destiny of the nation to the tender mercy of outsiders and realize their sinister goal in reliance on them.
					
					 The puppet chief executive set up the "preparatory committee for unification" while trumpeting about "getting ready for unification era" and "great opportunity for unification" and has kept herself busy, working out "unification charter" and "unification constitution".
					
					 Former puppet Unification Minister Ryu Kil Jae vociferated about international cooperation, saying this is the most important of the three wheels, ie the north-south relations wheel, international cooperation wheel and wheel for making preparations for "unification".
					
					 It is due to such diehard traitors keen on realizing "unification of social systems" in reliance on foreign forces while kowtowing to the U.S. which divided the nation into two that the north-south confrontation escalates and the independent reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, has not yet been realized.
					
					 The "unification of social systems" touted by the south Korean puppet forces is a pipedream.
					
					 They have to awake from it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Racket for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Forces' Racket for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The puppet forces of south Korea at a recent anti-DPRK confab with their American and Japanese masters in Tokyo over the six-party talks begged for "close cooperation" to hurt the DPRK while crying out for "deterring its provocation" and "denuclearizing" it.
					 Earlier, the riff-raffs of the puppet Foreign Ministry of south Korea invited a special envoy of the U.S. Department of State for the six-party talks to Seoul and deliberately took issue with the north while talking about "possible provocation by the north in the latter half of the year".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says the noisy racket for confrontation with the north kicked off by the puppet forces under the absurd pretext of the north's "provocation" is a brazen-faced act that can convince no one.
					
					 The bitter history of division of the Korean nation is one of madcap military provocations by the U.S. and the puppet forces to invade the DPRK, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet Defense Ministry recently announced that it would stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with the U.S. from August 17.
					
					 The puppet forces are working hard to justify their saber-rattling as "annual" and "defensive drills".
					
					 But with no rhetoric can they hide the provocative nature of their war rehearsals.
					
					 No matter how hard the puppet forces may try to do harm to the DPRK, they can never cover up the belligerent nature nor can they get rid of the criminal responsibility for escalating tensions and the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Distorting History
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Distorting History
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Recently, an official of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan blustered that labor conscription of those of the Korean peninsula origin in the past doesn't appertain to forced labor in view of international law.
					 Asserting the international community is "misunderstanding" the truth about the past sexual slavery, the party released a proposal urging the Japanese government to categorically refute it.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					The above-said moves clearly prove that the Japanese reactionaries have reached an extreme phase in their brazen-faced and impudent moves to cover up the hideous crimes perpetrated by Japanese imperialism against humanity.
					
					 Historical facts can never be concealed, the paper noted, and continued:
					
					 Former Chief Cabinet Secretary Kono repeatedly clarified his stand that coercion was obviously applied not only to drafting Koreans but to enlisting "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 More than 500 intellectuals in the U.S. and other countries issued a joint statement urging the Japanese authorities to make repentance and apology for its past wrongs including the sexual slavery.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are making desperate efforts to distort the history in a bid to prevent the disclosure of their past crimes while talking about "honor", but this will only bring into bold relief the disgrace of being a war criminal state.
					
					 There is no future for those who deny history.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Its Rampant Gun-related Crimes
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Its Rampant Gun-related Crimes
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Mass Shootings Tracker, a website in the U.S., made public the number of gun-related crimes that occurred throughout the U.S. this year.
					 According to it, 210 gun-related crimes had taken place in the U.S. for the 212 days from January to July this year.
					
					 This number seems to sharply contrast with the actual number of gun-related crimes in the U.S.
					
					 Americans are living in extreme uneasiness and fear due to a series of gun-related crimes occurring on a daily basis.
					
					 For example, three gun-related crimes on a daily average were reported in New York in 2013.
					
					 In New York police troops are deployed more densely than in any other cities as it is awash with headquarters of financial giants and monopolies.
					
					 Nevertheless, its daily gun-related crimes numbered three. This might help one easily guess the number of gun-related crimes throughout the U.S.
					
					 And one cannot but be skeptical about only one crime on a daily average in the U.S. cited by the above-said website.
					
					 The U.S., a cesspool of robbers, is a corrupt and ailing society under the reign of mammonism and the jungle law. 
					
					 Cases of murder and robbery can never decrease but increase in that country.
					
					 In 2013 when Obama announced a proposal for gun control, the first of its kind, public demand for guns drastically increased, which led to production of 10.8 million small guns or more than twice 4.5 million in the year before.
					
					 Increase in gun production and purchase inevitably leads to rampant gun-related crimes.
					
					 It is well illustrated by the analysis of 2008-2012 gun-related crimes published by the VPC, a non-profit body in the U.S.
					
					 According to it, there occurred in that period 1,108 cases of gun-related murders of self-defense (just 2.5 percent) while those of heinous gun-related crimes numbered 42,419 (97.5 percent).
					
					 This indicates that guns possessed by Americans are used mostly for robbery and killings.
					
					 The number of hooligans is on the steady increase and more than three hundred million guns are in the hands of Americans.
					
					 Therefore, it doesn't make sense that only one gun-related crime occurred in the U.S. every day.
					
					 The curtailed number of gun-related crimes released by the above-said U.S. website is no more than fraud to cover up the worst human rights abuses in the U.S.
					
					 The website published statistics after specifying only the "cases that left more than 4 people injured" as shooting spree.
					
					 Thanks to this false statistics, the actual number of gun-related crimes in the U.S. sounds "less terrible."
					
					 Worse still, the U.S. administration regards the "case in which more than three are killed by shooting" as a shooting spree.
					
					 As a result, even the case in which many people are hurt and one or two of them are killed by a criminal is not recognized as a shooting spree.
					
					 This is just the American criterion for judging social vices and dealing with human rights performance.
					
					 This not withstanding, the U.S., with this brazen-faced and twisted criterion, has painted wrong pictures of other countries where genuine human rights are ensured, describing them as "human rights abusers", while embellishing its worst human rights abuses.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. put under the carpet its worst human rights abuses.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Disclose U.S. Forces' Introduction of Live Anthrax
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Disclose U.S. Forces' Introduction of Live Anthrax
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The number of the research facilities which have received active anthrax germs from the U.S. forces is on the steady increase, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on Aug. 7.
					 193 research facilities received active anthrax germs from the U.S. forces, according to a website of the U.S. Defense Department.
					
					 87 research institutes directly received active anthrax germs from a research institute of the U.S. forces in Utah State. 106 research institutes were not aware that this was sample of active anthrax germs.

articles.title: Document on Japan's Sexual Slavery Opened to Public
articles.content:
Document on Japan's Sexual Slavery Opened to Public
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A  list of sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army captured as POWs was recently discovered among the declassified documents in Thailand at a time when Japan is making desperate efforts to keep its hideous crimes committed in the past buried into oblivion.
					 The list of those sexual slaves kept  in a Thai POW camp after the Pacific War said there were at least 1,500 Korean women and the names of over 460 women were given, according to the south Korean broadcasting service KBS.
					
					 Just before its defeat Japan's military issued a secret order to register those sexual slaves as "assistant nurses" for fear of the disclosure of its crimes against humanity.
					
					 It is the first time that such list was opened to the public.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to celebrate the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation on August 4 and 5.
					 They included a lecture in Guinea and photo and book exhibitions and film shows in Algeria, Iran, Mongolia and Romania.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of book and photo exhibitions were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Korean films including "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" and "Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" were shown at film shows.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea said in a lecture:
					
					 August 15 is the day of Korea's liberation.
					
					 On that day 70 years ago Korea was liberated and the Korean people could be freed from colonial slavery and lead an independent and dignified life as the master of their destiny and the proud master of the state and society.
					
					 The DPRK is admired by the international community as it has firmly defended its socialist cause, keeping to the road chosen by it.
					
					 After watching the film, the secretary general of the Taekwon-Do Association of Mongolia said that the DPRK could propel the building of an economic power, displaying its might as the politico-ideological power and military power, as it has the single-minded unity centered on the great leader.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at an event held in Mongolia.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed in Peru
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Observed in Peru
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship published a bulletin on August 3 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Korea's liberation, turning point of history", "Event to be specially recorded in Korean nation's history" and "Testimony of history."
					
					 The bulletin in its preface said:
					
					 August 15 this year is the significant day marking the 70th anniversary when President Kim Il Sung led the 15-year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 This anniversary is a meaningful occasion for the Korean people and world progressives to look back on such emotional events as liberation and victory.
					
					 The preface expressed once again full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts for the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Finland
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Finland
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A Finnish preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation was formed in Helsinki on July 31.
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events on the significant days of the DPRK and hold a European regional seminar against the U.S. in the run-up to the 70th anniversary of the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Norway
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK to Be Celebrated in Norway
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A Norwegian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation was inaugurated on July 31.
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, and Rita Berger, chief of the Ostfold Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the significant holidays of the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Group's Travelogue of DPRK Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Russian Group's Travelogue of DPRK Carried by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The 28th issue of the Russian paper Pravda Primoriya dedicated two whole pages to a travelogue of the DPRK by a group of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation for tour of the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 The group traveled the DPRK with the approach of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation for the purpose of touring revolutionary sites and battle sites including Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of Korea associated with the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 Members of the group left for Mt. Paektu at dawn, following in the footsteps of Marshal Kim Jong Un who climbed the mountain in April last to enjoy a bird's-eye view of the sunrise.
					
					 The visit to leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp helped them know well about the fact that the Korean people are valuing the revolutionary history and preserving relics well and that this helps educating young people in a revolutionary way.
					
					 Then they visited the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, Chongbong Bivouac, Konchang Bivouac, Rimyongsu Falls, etc.
					
					 They also visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of Kim Il Sung, the Revolutionary Museum and e-library of Kim Il Sung University, Kumsong School, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and other places in Pyongyang.
					
					 The head of the group noted that the visit to Mangyongdae provided an opportunity to know well about the patriotic and revolutionary family of Kim Il Sung and his family members who ardently loved the country, nation and people. The head extended thanks to Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, for letting the group experience the blizzard of Paektu.
					
					 The paper carried photos the members of the group had taken.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was carried by the Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda Vladivostok on August 4.
					 The work, which is a speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation successfully. 
					
					 The paper carried his photos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a triunfadoras en Copa Femenina de 2015 de FAF de Este de Asia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a triunfadoras en Copa Femenina de 2015 de FAF de Este de Asia
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 8 un mensaje de felicitacion a las triunfadoras en la Copa Femenina de 2015 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia.
					  El texto completo va como sigue: 
					
					  Extiendo mis calurosas felicitaciones a nuestras admirables y fidedignas jugadoras quienes con sus victorias arrolladoras en todos los enfrentamientos se han colocado lo mas alto del podio en la Copa Femenina de 2015 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia.
					
					  Ustedes han sabido corresponder de modo excelente a la fe del Partido, la patria y el pueblo en que triunfaran infaliblemente.
					
					  Han escrito un maravilloso mito deportivo al combatir con el espiritu indoblegable y metodos de ataque presentados por nuestro Partido.
					
					  Al lograr que en ese evento deportivo la bandera de nuestra Republica ondeara en lo alto para la envidia del mundo, han puesto de manifiesto el prestigio y el aspecto imponente de la potencia del Juche que brilla por los respetables nombres del gran Lider y del gran General y han preparado un regalo enorgullecedor en saludo a los aniversarios 70 de la liberacion de la patria y de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  Reitero mis calidas congratulaciones y saludos militantes a las hijas dignas de la Patria y el pueblo en nombre de nuestro Partido, gobierno de la Republica, todo el ejercito y demas sectores del pueblo.
					
					  El pais entero las espera.
					
					  Vuelvan sanas cuanto antes.

articles.title: Regresan a patria futbolistas de RPDC
articles.content:
Regresan a patria futbolistas de RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- Arribaron el dia 10 por via aerea a esta capital las dignas hijas de Corea del Songun, quienes en la Copa Femenina del Este de Asia de 2015 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia, efectuada en Wuhan de China, vencieron completamente con los 9 goles del oro a los equipos de Japon, China y el Sur de Corea al realizar a manera de ataque guerrillera los partidos y volvieron a obtener la copa honrosa creando el mito deportivo de las victorias sucesivas.
					En el aeropuerto el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, junto con Ri Sol Ju, las acogio personalmente.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Il Hwan, el ministro de Deportes Kim Yong Hun y el presidente de la Federacion de Futbol de la RPDC, Kim Jong Man.
					
					A las 4 de la tarde, entro a la parada frente al aerodromo el avion con las futbolistas.
					
					En medio de interpretacion de la musica de bienvenida, el Mariscal y Ri Sol Ju salieron a la parada.
					
					El Mariscal les dio calurosas felicitaciones a las futbolistas, quienes regresaron con la medalla de oro, tomando una tras otra sus manos y se fotografio con ellas.
					
					El Mariscal les felicito calurosamente en nombre del partido, el gobierno de la Republica, todo el ejercito y pueblo a las excelentes muchachas de la patria y el pueblo, quienes con la indoblegable fuerza espiritual y el metodo de ataque guerrillero presentado por el partido, exaltaron a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la potencia del Juche y prepararon un regalo orgulloso dedicado al 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria y de la fundacion del PTC, y les dio el cordial agradecimiento.
					
					Las futbolistas que en la tierra patria se reunieron antes que nadie con el Mariscal, no pudieron aguantar las lagrimas por la emocion y excitacion en el regazo del Mariscal.
					
					Las masas, que estaban repletos en el aeropuerto, acogieron fervorosamente a las futbolistas. 
					
					A lo largo de ruta de calles desde el aeropuerto hasta el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang mas de 200 mil trabajadores capitalinos les dieron calido recibimiento a las triunfadoras.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises
Cairo, 9 de agosto (corresponsal de la ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien esta de visita en Egipto para tomar parte en la ceremonia de inauguracion del nuevo Canal de Suez, departio por separado con el presidente de la Republica Togolesa, Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, el presidente de la Republica de Niger, Mahamadou Issoufou, el premier del la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev y el premier de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, Ibrahim Mahlab.
					El mandatario togoles dijo que su pais no olvida ni un momento la muy preciosa asistencia y el respaldo brindados por Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il y alabo las proezas de los grandes lideres coreanos por el fortalecimiento del Movimiento de los Paises No Alineados. 
					
					Es muy radiante el futuro de la RPDC bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, ratifico y expreso la voluntad de hacer ingentes esfuerzos por el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises. 
					
					Mahamadou Issoufou dio felicitaciones a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un quien fortalece el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como poderosa agrupacion politica y agrego que estrechara la cooperacion con la RPDC en los asuntos internacionales y en el Movimiento de los Paises No Alienados. 
					
					El premier ruso destaco que es potente la RPDC que hace frente a la campana de aislamiento y aplastamiento de EE.UU. y deseo de todo corazon que en la RPDC marchen bien todas las cosas bajo la orientacion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un.
					
					El premier egipcio manifesto agradecimiento por el hecho de que los intimos amigos coreanos toman parte en la ceremonia de inauguracion de nuevo Canal de Suez para felicitar al pueblo egipcio y compartir la alegria con los egipcios. 
					
					Aprecio que la RPDC brinda el apoyo y solidaridad con Egipto y deseo de todo corazon que bajo la sabia guia de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano alcance mayor progreso y desarrollo en todos los dominios.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia tergiversacion de historia de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia tergiversacion de historia de Japon
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del comite de examen de informaciones internacionales del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon dijo que el reclutamiento de hombres de origen de la Peninsula Coreana no puede ser considerado como trabajo forzoso en virtud de la ley internacional. 
					Al mismo tiempo, el Partido Democratico Liberal presento una propuesta que demanda al gobierno oponerse mas activamente al caso de esclavitud sexual, insistiendo en que la sociedad internacional tiene "mal entendido" al respecto.
					
					Esto muestra que llega al climax el cinismo de los reaccionarios japoneses para ocultar los tremendos crimenes de lesa humanidad cometidos por los imperialistas japoneses. 
					
					Revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual publicado en su edicion de este lunes y continua:
					
					Jamas podran encubrir los hechos historicos. 
					
					El ex director del secretariado del gabinete Kono reconocio y aclaro reiteradamente el caracter forzoso de reclutamiento de adolescentes y de "consoladoras" para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					
					Mas de 500 intelectuales de EE.UU. y de otros paises publicaron las declaraciones conjuntas demandando a las autoridades japonesas a pedir perdon por el caso de esclavitud sexual y otros problemas sobre su historia criminal. 
					
					Hasta el Departamento de Estado norteamericano reafirmo que el caso de esclavitud sexual cometido por el imperialismo japones en el periodo de la segunda guerra mundial es una "horrorosa violacion de derechos humanos". 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses recurren tesoneramente a la tergiversacion de la historia hablando de "honor" a fin de encubrir sus crimenes del pasado, lo cual pondra de relieve mas la deshonra del pais criminal. 
					
					No hay futuro para los que niegan la historia.  -0-
